other_tests.findings: Severe acute tubular necrosis observed on light microscopic examination.

other_tests.changes_over_time: Worsening tachypnea and oxygen saturation; intubation was required.

other_tests.findings: Progressive azotemia, mixed metabolic and respiratory acidosis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: CRRT was discontinued after 3 days due to frequent interruptions; improvement noted in urine output.

other_tests.findings: Blood urea nitrogen normalized, improvements in electrolite levels.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Substantial decrease in blood urea nitrogen after initiation.

other_tests.findings: Nonocclusive deep-vein thrombosis of the proximal and mid-superficial right femoral vein.
